pokedexEntries.gold: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
pokedexEntries.silver: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
pokedexEntries.crystal: When heat from its body causes the air around it to shimmer, this is a sign that it is ready to battle.
pokedexEntries.ruby: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
pokedexEntries.emerald: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames. Typhlosion create blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
pokedexEntries.diamond: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
pokedexEntries.pearl: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
pokedexEntries.platinum: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.

pokedexEntries.white2: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
